title: fps drops
body: my fps drop like a mf in this bih but only if i play god fist.

replies.body: There might be a bad game file failing to load assets on him properly.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and see if a repair might be able to fix this up.  Test it in a custom, and let me know!
